column2: I would say Uchi is more of a traditional Japanese place where you would find a lot of good sushi rolls. Actually
column3: that's probably their thing. On the other hand
column6: is more modern and more of a fusion places. With a lot of other Japanese dishes but definitely not known for their sushi. So if you are looking for good boring plain old sushi
column7: you would like Uchi better. But if you are for better food and more of a unique experience
